body.name: Stove Windscreen - Folding Camping Stove Windshield 4 Plates Stainless Steel Stove Windscreen for Outdoor, Picnic, Backpacking and Cooking Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 37 mins
features: Made from high-quality stainless steel: Keopuals Stove Windscreen provides excellent durability, ensuring long-lasting performance during outdoor adventures such as camping, picnics, backpacking, and cooking.

Efficient Wind Protection: With its four-plate design, the stove windshield effectively blocks wind from all sides, creating a sheltered cooking area. This feature enhances the efficiency of your camping stove by preventing gusts from extinguishing the flame.

Foldable and Portable: The windscreen is designed to be foldable, making it extremely compact and easy to carry. It conveniently fits into your backpack or camping gear, taking up minimal space while ensuring you have wind protection whenever you need it.

Adjustable and Versatile: The stainless steel plates of the windscreen can be adjusted to accommodate different stove sizes and shapes. This versatility makes it compatible with various camping stoves, ensuring a secure fit and optimal wind protection.

Easy to Use and Set Up: Setting up the Keopuals Stove Windscreen is quick and hassle-free. Simply unfold the plates and position them around your camping stove. The compact and user-friendly design allows for effortless assembly and disassembly, making it a convenient accessory for outdoor cooking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keopuals Stove Windscreen: Two color available! With its versatile design, the Keopuals Stove Windscreen fits most standard camping stoves, providing a secure and stable cooking platform. It effectively blocks out wind, increasing fuel efficiency and reducing cooking time, allowing you to focus on creating delicious meals for yourself, friends, and family. The vibrant green color not only adds a touch of style to your outdoor gear, but it also ensures high visibility, ma. king it easy to locate and assemble. The folding design allows for effortless storage and transportation, so you can take it with you wherever your adventures lead you.

A must-have companion for all your outdoor adventures! Made from high-quality stainless steel, this windscreen offers exceptional durability, ensuring long-lasting performance during camping, picnics, backpacking, and cooking. The Keopuals Stove Windscreen is also foldable and portable, making it incredibly compact and easy to carry. It conveniently fits into your backpack or camping gear, taking up minimal space while ensuring you have reliable wind protection whenever you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars phe no men al, ultimate backpack-friendly stove situation
reviews.reviewText: I love this little thing so so much! The fire-starter bracelet it came with is cool too, but it's too big for my tiny wrist and the compass is pretty low quality (but I didn't order this for the bracelet so I don't mind at all)Great quality, super durable, almost wrought iron-like feel but thin enough to keep it lightweight. The chain is really dynamic and doesn't snag on itself like so many do. I love this tool and it adds a nice, clean feel to my campsite with so little material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod plate - could care less about the bracelet.
reviews.reviewText: The tripod plate is great. I just came back from a 2 week dry/dispersed camping trip and wished I had one of these several times. Yes I know how to do this with knots and ropes, but this is so much easier, isn’t going to burn like the ropes can, and includes a chain for hanging pots from. The bracelet is a meh item to me - the cord might be useful but the rest of it is more or less throw-away or only to be used in desperate situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: That’s the whole point of buying camping equipment.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does the job great
reviews.reviewText: minus 1 star due to the brown coating gets stained with the fire, get the green!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Amazon auto price adjustments are crazy
reviews.reviewText: I don't think the windscreen should cost more than the stove, plus the fuel, plus the pot, plus the food.
